content.text: Not much, just enjoying this beautiful day.
I'm at my family cabin in the great white north.
Wow that sounds amazing! I wish I was there right now.
You should come visit! We have plenty of room.
I might just take you up on that offer. I've always wanted to visit Canada.
You'd be more than welcome. We have lots of fun things to do here.
What are some of your favorite things to do in Canada?
I love to go skiing, hiking, and camping.
Those all sound like amazing activities. I'm not sure if I'm quite ready for skiing, but I'd definitely love to go hiking and camping.
We have some great hiking trails and camping spots. You're sure to have a great time.
I'm sure I would. I'm looking forward to visiting you guys soon.
We're looking forward to seeing you too!
